description: Prognostic biomarker strongly associated with overall survival. Higher expression correlates with improved patient outcomes.
Predictive biomarker for treatment response. Expression levels influence sensitivity to chemotherapy.
Cell cycle regulator involved in DNA damage response. Essential for genomic stability.
Growth factor receptor with tyrosine kinase activity. Target of several approved therapies.
Tumor suppressor gene involved in apoptosis regulation. Loss correlates with poor prognosis.
Metabolic enzyme upregulated in hypoxic tumor environments.
Immune checkpoint modulator. Influences response to immunotherapy.
Stem cell marker associated with tumor initiation and recurrence.
DNA repair enzyme. Expression predicts response to DNA-damaging agents.
Angiogenesis factor. Serum levels used as prognostic marker.
